verses.verse: My <S%H410>God,<s%> my <S%H410>God,<s%> why have you <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> <S%H7350>me?<s%> Why are you so far from <S%H3444>helping<s%> <S%H1697>me,<s%> and from the words of my <S%H7581>groaning?<s%>
My <S%H430>God,<s%> I <S%H7121>cry<s%> in the <S%H3119>daytime,<s%> but you <S%H6030>don't<s%> answer; in the night <S%H3915>season,<s%> and am not <S%H1747>silent.<s%>
But you are <S%H6918>holy,<s%> you who <S%H3427>inhabit<s%> the <S%H8416>praises<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
Our <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H982>trusted<s%> in <S%H982>you.<s%> They trusted, and you delivered <S%H6403>them.<s%>
They <S%H2199>cried<s%> to <S%H4422>you,<s%> and were delivered. They <S%H982>trusted<s%> in <S%H954>you,<s%> and were not disappointed.
But I am a <S%H8438>worm,<s%> and no <S%H376>man;<s%> a <S%H2781>reproach<s%> of <S%H120>men,<s%> and <S%H959>despised<s%> by the <S%H120>people.<s%>
All those who <S%H7200>see<s%> me mock <S%H3932>me.<s%> They insult me <S%H6358>with<s%> their <S%H8193>lips.<s%> They <S%H5128>shake<s%> their <S%H7218>heads,<s%> saying,
"He <S%H1556>trusts<s%> in <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> let him <S%H6403>deliver<s%> <S%H6403>him.<s%> Let him rescue <S%H2654>him,<s%> since he delights in him."
But you <S%H1518>brought<s%> me out of the <S%H990>womb.<s%> You made me <S%H982>trust<s%> at my <S%H517>mother<s%>'s <S%H7699>breasts.<s%>
I was <S%H7993>thrown<s%> on you from my <S%H7358>mother<s%>'s womb. You are my <S%H410>God<s%> since my <S%H517>mother<s%> bore <S%H990>me.<s%>
<S%H7368>Don't<s%> be far from <S%H6869>me,<s%> for trouble is <S%H7138>near.<s%> For there is none to <S%H5826>help.<s%>
<S%H7227>Many<s%> <S%H6499>bulls<s%> have <S%H5437>surrounded<s%> <S%H47>me.<s%> Strong bulls of <S%H1316>Bashan<s%> have encircled <S%H3803>me.<s%>
They <S%H6475>open<s%> their <S%H6310>mouths<s%> wide against <S%H738>me,<s%> lions <S%H2963>tearing<s%> prey and <S%H7580>roaring.<s%>

I am poured <S%H8210>out<s%> like <S%H4325>water.<s%> All my <S%H6106>bones<s%> are out of <S%H6504>joint.<s%> My <S%H3820>heart<s%> is like <S%H1749>wax;<s%> it is <S%H4549>melted<s%> <S%H8432>within<s%> <S%H4578>me.<s%>

My <S%H3581>strength<s%> is dried <S%H3001>up<s%> like a <S%H2789>potsherd.<s%> My <S%H3956>tongue<s%> <S%H1692>sticks<s%> to the roof of my <S%H4455>mouth.<s%> You have <S%H8239>brought<s%> me into the <S%H6083>dust<s%> of <S%H4194>death.<s%>

For <S%H3611>dogs<s%> have <S%H5437>surrounded<s%> <S%H5712>me.<s%> A company of <S%H7489>evildoers<s%> have <S%H5362>enclosed<s%> <S%H3738>me.<s%> They have pierced my <S%H3027>hands<s%> and <S%H7272>feet.<s%>
I can <S%H5608>count<s%> all of my <S%H6106>bones.<s%> They <S%H5027>look<s%> and stare at <S%H7200>me.<s%>
They <S%H2505>divide<s%> my <S%H899>garments<s%> among <S%H5307>them.<s%> They cast <S%H1486>lots<s%> for my <S%H3830>clothing.<s%>
But <S%H7368>don't<s%> be far <S%H3068>off,<s%> Yahweh. You are my <S%H360>help:<s%> <S%H2363>hurry<s%> to help <S%H5833>me.<s%>
<S%H5337>Deliver<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> from the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> my <S%H3173>precious<s%> life from the <S%H3027>power<s%> of the <S%H3611>dog.<s%>
<S%H3467>Save<s%> me from the <S%H738>lion<s%>'s <S%H6310>mouth!<s%> <S%H7161>Yes,<s%> from the horns of the wild <S%H7214>oxen,<s%> you have answered <S%H6030>me.<s%>
I will <S%H5608>declare<s%> your <S%H8034>name<s%> to my <S%H251>brothers.<s%> In the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H6951>assembly,<s%> I will praise <S%H1984>you.<s%>

You who <S%H3373>fear<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H1984>praise<s%> <S%H2233>him!<s%> All you descendants of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> <S%H3513>glorify<s%> <S%H1481>him!<s%> Stand in awe of <S%H2233>him,<s%> all you descendants of <S%H3478>Israel!<s%>

For he has not <S%H959>despised<s%> nor <S%H8262>abhorred<s%> the <S%H6039>affliction<s%> of the <S%H6041>afflicted,<s%> Neither has he <S%H5641>hidden<s%> his <S%H6440>face<s%> from <S%H7768>him;<s%> but when he cried to <S%H8085>him,<s%> he heard.
Of you comes my <S%H8416>praise<s%> in the <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H6951>assembly.<s%> I will <S%H7999>pay<s%> my <S%H5088>vows<s%> before those who fear <S%H3373>him.<s%>

The <S%H6035>humble<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> and be <S%H7646>satisfied.<s%> They shall <S%H1984>praise<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> who <S%H1875>seek<s%> after <S%H3824>him.<s%> Let your hearts <S%H2421>live<s%> <S%H5703>forever.<s%>

All the <S%H657>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> shall <S%H2142>remember<s%> and <S%H7725>turn<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> All the <S%H4940>relatives<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%> shall <S%H7812>worship<s%> before <S%H6440>you.<s%>
For the <S%H4410>kingdom<s%> is <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s. He is the <S%H4910>ruler<s%> over the <S%H1471>nations.<s%>

All the <S%H1879>rich<s%> ones of the <S%H776>earth<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> and <S%H7812>worship.<s%> All those who go <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H6083>dust<s%> shall <S%H3766>bow<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H5315>him,<s%> even he who can't keep his soul <S%H2421>alive.<s%>
<S%H2233>Posterity<s%> shall <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H1755>him.<s%> Future generations shall be <S%H5608>told<s%> about the <S%H136>Lord.<s%>
They shall <S%H935>come<s%> and shall <S%H5046>declare<s%> his <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> to a <S%H5971>people<s%> that shall be <S%H3205>born,<s%> for he has done <S%H6213>it.<s%>
